def is_bathtub_shower_present(bathtub: item):
    symbol shower_present = exists shower: item : is_shower(shower) and close(shower, bathtub)
    return shower_present

behavior place_cat_in_bathtub(cat: item, bathtub: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Place the cat inside the bathtub

behavior shower_cat(cat: item, bathtub: item):
    body:
        if is_bathtub_shower_present(bathtub):
            bind shower: item where:
                is_shower(shower) and close(shower, bathtub)
            achieve_once is_on(shower)
            # Turn on the shower

        wash(cat) # Shower the cat

        if is_bathtub_shower_present(bathtub):
            bind shower: item where:
                is_shower(shower) and close(shower, bathtub)
            achieve_once is_off(shower)
            # Turn off the shower

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathtub: item where:

        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat) and inhand(cat)
        # Assume the cat is currently in hand from the previous action
        place_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)
        shower_cat(cat, bathtub)
